help.title: Need help?
help.subtitle: Browse docs and AI tips for faster answers.
help.tip: Tip: Ask the AI tab for summaries, anomalies, and next steps.
help.fallbackBody: No help is available for this page yet.

timesheets.title: Timesheets help
timesheets.intro: Quick tips for managing calendar entries and travel visibility.

bullets.switchViews: Switch between Month, Week, and List views from the toolbar.
bullets.createEdit: Click a day to add an entry; click an entry to edit.
bullets.scope: Managers can toggle Mine / Others / All in the header.

bullets.indicators: Travel indicators appear on calendar days with trips.
bullets.listView: In list views, click the ‚úà travel line to see details.

bullets.alerts: Alerts highlight AI flags and policy issues.
bullets.weekly: Weekly breakdown is available in Week view.
bullets.filters: Use the daily hours cap chip to filter overages.

bullets.chat: Ask for summaries of flagged entries or trends.
bullets.suggestions: Use suggestion chips to start a question.

bullets.dragRange: Select and drag a time range to create entries across multiple days/hours.
bullets.aiDrafts: Ask AI to generate draft entries for a selected date range (you review before saving).

timesheetsReports.title: Timesheet reports
timesheetsReports.intro: Use reports to analyze hours, costs, and activity by project, task, and technician.

bullets.dateRange: Use the date range to focus on a specific period.
bullets.projectTask: Filter by project and task to drill into specific work.
bullets.technicianScope: Switch scope (mine / others / all) if you have permissions.

bullets.grouping: Group results by project, task, technician, or day to spot patterns.
bullets.totals: Review totals to validate expected hours and compare periods.
bullets.readResults: Click rows to inspect details before taking action.

bullets.downloads: Export the current view for sharing or offline review.
bullets.share: Use consistent filters before sharing results with the team.

bullets.questions: Ask AI questions like ‚Äúwhy did hours spike last week?‚Äù.
bullets.summaries: Ask AI to summarize key insights and anomalies from the report.

ai.title: Ask TimePerk AI
ai.subtitle: Summarize anomalies, approvals, and trends.

examples.title: Examples
items:
DATE_RANGE=2026-02-10..2026-02-14
Projeto: "Mobile Banking App"
Bloco 1: 09:00-13:00
Bloco 2: 14:00-18:00

Bloco 2: 14:00‚Äì18:00

Project: "Mobile Banking App"
Block 1: 09:00-13:00
Block 2: 14:00-18:00

prompts.timesheets: Which entries were flagged in the period {{from}}..{{to}}?
prompts.expenses: Which expenses were flagged in the period {{from}}..{{to}}?
prompts.approvals: Which approvals are pending or flagged in the period {{from}}..{{to}}?
prompts.planning: Which planning risks were detected in the period {{from}}..{{to}}?
prompts.projects: Which projects exceeded budgeted hours in the period {{from}}..{{to}}?

prompts.overtime: Where did overtime spike in the period {{from}}..{{to}}?
prompts.projectBudget: Which projects exceeded budgeted hours in the period {{from}}..{{to}}?

guidedFilter.question: Do you want to filter by project or technician?

flaggedResults.title: {{domain}} flagged ({{from}}..{{to}})
flaggedResults.none: No flagged {{domain}} found in this period.
flaggedResults.draftsHint: {{count}} drafts exist in this period. Drafts are not AI-flagged.

overtimeResults.title: Overtime spikes ({{from}}..{{to}})
overtimeResults.none: No overtime spikes found in this period.

projectBudgetResults.title: Projects over budget ({{from}}..{{to}})
projectBudgetResults.none: No projects exceeded budgeted hours in this period.

planningResults.title: Planning risks ({{from}}..{{to}})
planningResults.unsupported: Planning risk signals are not available yet. Review tasks for this period in Planning.
planningResults.filtersNotice: Project/technician filters are not available for Planning yet.

unsupported.title: Supported insights
unsupported.message: I can help with flagged entries, pending approvals, overtime spikes, and project budget overruns. Pick one below or include a date range.

ai.placeholderResponse: I'm still learning. For now, I can summarize the report based on your question.
ai.errorFallback: Something went wrong. Please try again.
ai.addonNotice: AI is available as an add-on for your plan.
ai.disabledMessage: Enable AI in tenant billing settings to continue.
ai.disabledTenant: AI is disabled for this tenant.
ai.unavailable: AI is not available for this tenant.
ai.enabledNotice: Ask a question to generate insights.

reports.aiIntro: Ask about this report or pick a suggestion to start.
reports.noInsights: No insights yet. Run the report to populate insights.

timesheets.aiAvailableBody: {{count}} entries were flagged and are ready for review.

caOt2.title: OT2 threshold reached
caOt2.noDays: No days exceeded the OT2 threshold.

login.tagline: The brain behind your team's time

errors.ssoFailed: SSO login failed. Please try again or use email and password.
errors.ssoOnly: This workspace requires Single Sign-On. Please use the buttons below.

fields.workspaceSlugHelper: This will be your unique workspace identifier (e.g., acme.vendaslive.com)

register.captchaPrompt: Just one more step: confirm you‚Äôre not a robot.

register.expiresIn: The verification link will expire in {{hours}} hours.
register.devLinkCopied: Verification URL + token copied to clipboard
register.noEmailNotice: Didn't receive the email? Check your spam folder or

errors.slugFormat: Slug can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens
errors.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters
errors.legalRequired: You must accept the Terms, Privacy Policy, and Acceptable Use Policy

verify.loadingBody: Please wait while we verify your email address.

success.title: Email verified!

captcha.title: Security check required

errors.missingTokenLink: Verification token is missing. Please check your email link.

errors.emailNotVerified: Please verify your email first, then try again.
errors.expired: This verification link has expired. Please start the registration process again.
errors.notFound: Invalid verification link. Please check your email or start registration again.
errors.slugTaken: This workspace name is no longer available. Please start registration again with a different name.
errors.signupFailed: Signup failed. Please try again or contact support.
errors.verificationFailed: Verification failed. Please try again or contact support.

header.tagline: The brain behind your team's time

aiTimesheet.title: AI Timesheet Builder
aiTimesheet.subtitle: Generate draft entries from a natural language prompt.
aiTimesheet.promptPlaceholder: Example: Create timesheet entries for 5 days (Mon-Fri), 09:00-18:00, lunch 12:30-13:30, project ACME, task Installation.

existingNoTime.title: Existing entries without time
existingNoTime.message: We cannot validate overlaps because there are existing entries without time on this day. The new AI proposal does include hours.

labels.reviewExistingEntries: Review existing entries and add hours

actions.addTimes: Provide start and end times for each block
actions.adjustTimes: Adjust the times so they do not overlap

break.title: Break required

actions.addBreak: Add a break in the schedule

project.title: Project not found

steps.menuTimesheets: Open Timesheets from the left menu.
steps.timesheetsCalendar: This is your timesheet calendar. Navigate days/weeks/months and click a date to add entries.
steps.timesheetsScope: Use Scope to switch between your entries, others, or everyone (managers/admins).
steps.aiTrigger: Use this button to open Insights and AI tools.
steps.rightPanelToggle: Use the X to close the right panel.
steps.aiTab: Switch to the AI Chat tab here.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Create and maintain projects, dates, and status.

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.description: Manage tasks, progress, dependencies, and locations.

locations.title: Locations
locations.description: Maintain location records used in work logs and travels.

users.title: Users
users.description: Manage team members, roles, and payroll identifiers.
